alert.note: Alert for Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 10:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Transylvania, east central Jackson and northwestern Pickens Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1058 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Brevard to 6 miles west of Pickens. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rosman, Lake Toxaway, Jocassee Gorges, Gorges State Park, Keowee Toxaway State Park, Table Rock State Park, Lake Jocassee, Graveyard Fields, Lake Keowee and Balsam Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
